INSERT INTO books
title, slug, subtitle, series_id, series_order, isbn, publication_year, publisher, language_id, description, summary, cover_image_url, cover_image_path, file_url, file_path, file_format, file_size, total_word, total_pages, estimated_read_time, difficulty_level, copyright_status_id, view_count, download_count, average_rating, total_reviews, is_featured, is_active, published_at, category, created_at, updated_at,
VALUES
#{title}, #{slug}, #{subtitle}, #{seriesId}, #{seriesOrder}, #{isbn}, #{publicationYear}, #{publisher}, #{languageId}, #{description}, #{summary}, #{coverImageUrl}, #{coverImagePath}, #{fileUrl}, #{filePath}, #{fileFormat}, #{fileSize}, #{totalWord}, #{totalPages}, #{estimatedReadTime}, #{difficultyLevel}, #{copyrightStatusId}, #{viewCount}, #{downloadCount}, #{averageRating}, #{totalReviews}, #{isFeatured}, #{isActive}, #{publishedAt}, #{category}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt},
INSERT INTO book_contributors (book_id, author_id, role_id) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{authorId})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.slug, b.edition, b.cover_image_url, b.publisher, b.publication_year, b.file_url, b.file_format, b.file_size, b.total_pages, b.description, b.summary, b.estimated_read_time, l.name as language, b.total_word, b.difficulty_level, b.view_count, b.read_count, b.download_count, b.subtitle, b.series_id, b.series_order, cs.name as copyright_status, b.published_at, b.category, -- Author fields (dengan alias yang jelas) a.id as author_id, a.name as author_name, a.slug as author_slug, a.birth_date as author_birth_date, a.death_date as author_death_date, a.birth_place as author_birth_place, a.nationality as author_nationality, a.photo_url as author_photo_url, -- Contributor fields (dengan alias yang jelas) c.id as contributor_id, c.name as contributor_name, c.slug as contributor_slug, bc.role as contributor_role, c.website_url as contributor_website_url, -- Genre fields (dengan alias yang jelas) g.id as genre_id, g.name as genre_name, g.slug as genre_slug, g.color_hex as genre_color_hex, g.is_fiction as genre_is_fiction, -- Reaction stats (aggregate data - contoh, sesuaikan dengan tabel lu) COALESCE(rs.total_ratings, 0) as total_ratings, COALESCE(rs.total_angry, 0) as total_angry, COALESCE(rs.total_likes, 0) as total_likes, COALESCE(rs.total_loves, 0) as total_loves, COALESCE(rs.total_dislikes, 0) as total_dislikes, COALESCE(rs.total_sad, 0) as total_sad, COALESCE(rs.total_comments, 0) as total_comments, COALESCE(rs.average_rating, 0.0) as average_rating FROM books b JOIN languages l ON b.language_id = l.id JOIN copyright_statuses cs ON b.copyright_status_id = cs.id LEFT JOIN book_authors ba ON b.id = ba.book_id LEFT JOIN authors a ON ba.author_id = a.id LEFT JOIN book_contributors bc ON b.id = bc.book_id LEFT JOIN contributors c ON bc.contributor_id = c.id LEFT JOIN book_genres bg ON b.id = bg.book_id LEFT JOIN genres g ON bg.genre_id = g.id LEFT JOIN ( -- Subquery untuk reaction stats (sesuaikan dengan struktur tabel reactions lu) SELECT book_id, COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'RATING' THEN 1 END) as total_ratings, COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'ANGRY' THEN 1 END) as total_angry, COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'LIKE' THEN 1 END) as total_likes, COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'LOVE' THEN 1 END) as total_loves, COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'DISLIKE' THEN 1 END) as total_dislikes, COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'SAD' THEN 1 END) as total_sad, COUNT(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'COMMENT' THEN 1 END) as total_comments, AVG(CASE WHEN reaction_type = 'RATING' THEN rating END) as average_rating FROM reactions GROUP BY book_id ) rs ON b.id = rs.book_id WHERE b.slug = #{slug}

SELECT id, title, slug, subtitle, series_id, series_order, isbn, publication_year, publisher, language_id, description, summary, cover_image_url, cover_image_path, file_url, file_path, file_format, file_size, total_word, total_pages, estimated_read_time, difficulty_level, copyright_status_id, view_count, read_count, download_count, average_rating, total_reviews, is_featured, is_active, published_at, category, created_at, updated_at FROM books WHERE id = #{id}
